p: In addition to YF, Brazil has experienced outbreaks of other arboviruses during 2017â€“2018, including Zika, for which there were 3308 confirmed cases, chikungunya with 61,625 confirmed cases and dengue with 145,137 confirmed cases and 304 deaths [ 11]. Another arthropod-borne disease that has come to attention is mayaro virus disease, for which the majority of cases have been registered in the Northern Region of the country where it is endemic, although it has also been detected in other regions of Brazil [ 12].
